_header: Right youngly fair replete with goodlihood
Subjects: lovers, addresses to beloved; lover’s, pleas; envoys
_description: Have pity, mistress, by Charles d’Orléans — three 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) and 4-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
Right yongly fayre replet with goodlihedAlak for lak nede shulde
                    enneden me…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…Then for my loue to shewe me cruelteAllas how long wil ye
                    straunge in þis wise
